text: - What permissions do you give others to modify and/or maintain your submission? - Modify: YES - Maintain: YES - I give permission for my entire submission to be modified by others or used in their own work. I give permission for my entire submission to be maintained by others as well. - I made sure my file(s) follow the Submissions Guidelines - Yes - I named my file(s) correctly (see Filename Conventions) - Yes Experience the old 2.0 level pack like never before! This is an update to E123OmegaShow's 10 years old Sonic Adventure DX level pack for SRB2 2.0, now for SRB2 2.2! Note that this is based on the 2.0 version and not on the 2.1 version! The idea of porting it came to my mind during touching EHZHangout or Sunshine Isles up for release. And then, one day after I submitted the latter, I decided to start working on this! So, here you go. After a bit more than 2 months of development, it's here! This level pack is an adaption of Sonic Adventure DX into SRB2. The level design is completely different from the original stages featured in the game. I hope you will have fun with this level pack! It's also 10 years old now lol. Important for hosters: IT'S RECOMMENDED TO USE THE PATCH INCLUDED IN THE ADDON FOR ONLINE! IF YOU USE IT, LOAD IT AFTER YOU LOAD THE MAIN MOD! This mod forces characters in every map, except the 2 bonus maps, and the patch basically removes that for map 01-10, 22, 28 and A1. These maps are Sonic's story (01-10), Hot Shelter (22) and the 2 bonus maps. Find the latter out for yourself :P. It also tweaks some of the maps to be beatable by everyone. - New textures - Skyboxes! - Some textures have been replaced with a higher quality/different version - Some new textures - Brand new title screen! - Title screen demos! - Texture alignment improvements/changes - Some maps have scrolling water textures - Different water textures - Big the Cat is now purple - Amy has a Hammer Jump courtesy of Pyrakid Wolfo! - No more air walking, this was done by EeveeEuphoria - Colormapped water! - Some level design changes (such as removing almost every "kill all enemies" sections) - Reworked Tails' story - Stories are now unlocked by beating one, instead of collecting emblems. I won't fix this, the web port runs on 2.2.4, and that version's outdated as hell. Sorry, web port users... Maybe the issue above happens with this too, idk. I wouldn't be surprised - The title screen's background looks wrong on non-green resolutions - Monitors don't look exactly right in OpenGL. They function like intended otherwise - Checkpoints and monitors don't look right in Multiplayer, if you're not the host. The host can fix this by reloading the map or warping to a different one. Adventure Sonic! All with his speedy tricks in his pocket! - Adventure Style Emblems - Adventure-like emblems! - Sonic Adventure style HUD - The Sonic Adventure 1/Sonic Adventure DX HUD. - E-102 Gamma - Unfortunately, he wasn't included in the original mod, and so he isn't included in this mod by default. But luckily, TehRealSalt made a REAL Gamma mod, so if you want, you can play as him in """SADX""" now! - SA1 Spindash - So that everyone has the spamdash.
